term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - detection efficiency in nuclear analytical chemistry
term.title: detection efficiency

item.text: The ratio between the number of particles or photons detected and the number of similar particles or photons emitted by the radiation source.

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 1533. 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' on page 1539 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254081533)
